title: Pennsylvania House Moves to Impeach Philadelphia’s Progressive D.A.
description: The impeachment articles charge that Larry Krasner has been “derelict in his obligations” to prosecute crimes in a city struggling with a spike in gun violence.
media:credit: Michelle Gustafson for The New York Times
media:description: District Attorney Larry Krasner told reporters on Friday that lawmakers seeking to impeach him were trying “to erase Philadelphia’s votes” and attributed the move to a “superheated election cycle.”
